 2009-17582009-10-22,  ,  ,  NRCAN, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-4-EC-III-1 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate EC-III-1)
PrecisOrder amending the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity EC-III-1 to reflect the name change of the certificate holder and operator of the international power line from Teck Cominco Metals Ltd. to Teck Metals Ltd.
